description.value:
Heavy Cloth Shelter that expands to durable shelter with added water (or most other liquids). Outer side becoming rockcrete, inner side heat insulating silica. Has room for up to 3 people. Good and Best fit 4 and 6 respectively. Comes in water proof bag.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
